meanings.definition: Lack of fairness or justice; unfairness.
meanings.sent1: The teacher addressed the inequities in the grading system.
meanings.sent2: The community protested against the inequities in access to healthcare.
meanings.sent3: The inequities in the game made it more challenging and fun.
meanings.sent4: The inequities in wealth distribution were like a gaping hole in society.
meanings.sent5: The inequities in the system were as clear as day, impossible to ignore.

meanings.sent1: She fought against the inequities in the workplace.
meanings.sent2: The government promised to address the inequities in education.
meanings.sent3: The inequities in the race were so obvious, it was almost comical.
meanings.sent4: The inequities in opportunities felt like a heavy weight on his shoulders.
meanings.sent5: The inequities in treatment were like a dark cloud hanging over the community.
